text:
Fans were elated to hear that Tom Jackson, the fan-favourite client from Netflix’s “Queer Eye”, was back together with his ex-wife Abby.

And with the recent news that the pair is engaged, they are losing their minds.

Viewers fell in love with Jackson and his search to rekindle his love for Abby, and at the end of his episode, called “You Can’t Fix Ugly”, Jackson and Abby seemed to hit it off.

After initially reporting they had broken up, Jackson surprised fans, including Brie Larson, with the happy news that he and Abby are an item once more.

IM PANICKING IM PANICKING IM CRYING https://t.co/6sawSQAU1X — Brie Larson (@brielarson) March 9, 2018

RELATED: ‘Queer Eye’ Guys Give Netflix Nerds Team A Makeover

Jackson has put his fans through a rollercoaster of emotions, originally Tweeting that he and Abby had broken up, which many did not take well.

I just watched my episode for about the 20th time. I cry 😭 like a baby 👶 ever time I watch it. Just to let the world 🌎 know, Abby and I are no longer together. She will always be the love ❤️ of my life. I will always love ❤️ her more than anything!!!!!!! — Tom Jackson (@TomJack20176306) February 28, 2018

RELATED: ‘Queer Eye’ Is Back: First Look At New Fab Five As Heartwarming Trailer Is Unveiled

Netflix rebooted the popular makeover show, “Queer Eye”, starring the fab 5, Tan France, Antoni Porowski, Bobby Berk, Karamo Brown and Jonathan Van Ness.

“Queer Eye” is now streaming on Netflix.
title: Beloved Tom From Netflix’s ‘Queer Eye’ Is Engaged To His Love Abby
